plot: A Neapolitan camorra boss has retired from business but when his wife gets killed he gets back into action, and goes to the States to get his revenge.
title: Napoli, Palermo, New York - Il triangolo della camorra
plot_es: A Neapolitan camorra boss has retired from business but when his wife gets killed he gets back into action, and goes to the States to get his revenge.
original_name: Napoli, Palermo, New York - Il triangolo della camorra
plot_en: A Neapolitan camorra boss has retired from business but when his wife gets killed he gets back into action, and goes to the States to get his revenge.
